page.title: 17SUMMER 1985 IN EAST PRESTON.
page.content:
V.E. DAY 40 YEARS ON
The Chickadee play group decorated the youth club where they meet with bunting,Union Jacks and photographs of V.E.Day to celebrate the 40th anniversary. A party was organised after the style of the Street Parties which were held throughout Britain to celebrate V.E.Day.The under 5's enjoyed singing and dancing games,crisps and cakes and went home with a hat,a bag of sweets and a Union Jack flag.
{The Village Hall Once a flint barn for Homestead Farm, it was given as part of a bequest along with the sports field and recre- ation ground to the village by the Warren family. It has been a rifle-
